item.description: This is the best way to get to know the city's brilliant and richly varied cultural landscape. You can visit exciting art galleries and museums as part of your evening out with friends and neighbors. Several venues have special events planned. So, hop on the trolley and make 200 Bedford Street -- with the Millyard Museum, the SEE Science Center and FIRST Place -- one of your evening's destinations! THIS EVENT LASTS FROM 5:00 P.M. TO 8:00 P.M. FREE ADMISSION. NO RSVP IS REQUIRED
item.name: Open Doors Manchester Art and Cultural Tour
